blocks.name: cresv
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the scalar restriction operation.

blocks.name: df-resv
blocks.content: Define an operator to restrict the scalar field component of an extended structure. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 5-Sep-2018.)

blocks.name: reldmresv
blocks.content: The scalar restriction is a proper operator, so it can be used with ~ ovprc1 . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 6-Sep-2018.)

blocks.name: resvval
blocks.content: Value of structure restriction. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 6-Sep-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm resvval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(c4, cif(c0, co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(csca, cnx), co(c6, cress, c2))), wss(c5, c2))))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c0, cresv, c2))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(csca, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c6))
} = {
  syl5eq(c4, cif(c0, co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(csca, cnx), co(c6, cress, c2))), wss(c5, c2)), co(c0, cresv, c2), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(co(c0, cresv, c2), cif(c0, co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(csca, cnx), co(c6, cress, c2))), wss(c5, c2))), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  elex(c2, c3)
  mpd3an3(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe), wceq(co(c0, cresv, c2), cif(c0, co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(csca, cnx), co(c6, cress, c2))), wss(c5, c2))), wcel(cif(c0, co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(csca, cnx), co(c6, cress, c2))), wss(c5, c2)), universe))
  adantr(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(cif(c0, co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(csca, cnx), co(c6, cress, c2))), wss(c5, c2)), universe))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(cif(c0, co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(csca, cnx), co(c6, cress, c2))), wss(c5, c2)), universe), wcel(co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(csca, cnx), co(c6, cress, c2))), universe))
  ovex(c0, csts, cop(cfv(csca, cnx), co(c6, cress, c2)))
  ifcl(c0, universe, co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(csca, cnx), co(c6, cress, c2))), wss(c5, c2))
  ovmpt2ga(hs0, hs1, c0, universe, c2, universe, cif(c0, co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(csca, cnx), co(c6, cress, c2))), wss(c5, c2)), universe, cresv, cif(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs0), csts, cop(cfv(csca, cnx), co(cfv(csca, cv(hs0)), cress, cv(hs1)))), wss(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, cv(hs0))), cv(hs1))))
  ifbieq12d(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs0), csts, cop(cfv(csca, cnx), co(cfv(csca, cv(hs0)), cress, cv(hs1)))), c0, co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(csca, cnx), co(c6, cress, c2))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)), wss(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, cv(hs0))), cv(hs1)), wss(c5, c2))
  sseq12d(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, cv(hs0))), cv(hs1), c5, c2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, cv(hs0))), c5, cfv(cbs, c6), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  fveq2d(cbs, cfv(csca, cv(hs0)), c6, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  oveq12d(cv(hs0), csts, cop(cfv(csca, cnx), co(cfv(csca, cv(hs0)), cress, cv(hs1))), c0, cop(cfv(csca, cnx), co(c6, cress, c2)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  opeq2d(cfv(csca, cnx), co(cfv(csca, cv(hs0)), cress, cv(hs1)), co(c6, cress, c2), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  oveq12d(cfv(csca, cv(hs0)), cress, cv(hs1), c6, c2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  syl6eqr(cfv(csca, cv(hs0)), c6, cfv(csca, c0), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  fveq2d(csca, cv(hs0), c0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  simpl(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  simpr(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  df-resv(hs0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cif(c0, co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(csca, cnx), co(c6, cress, c2))), wss(c5, c2)))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(cif(c0, co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(csca, cnx), co(c6, cress, c2))), wss(c5, c2)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm resvval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí c4 = if(c5 ‚äÜ c2, c0,(c0[sSet]<(Scalar ` ndx),(c6[|`s]c2)>)))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(c0[|`v]c2)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(Scalar ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(Base ` c6)
} = {
  syl5eq(c4, if(c5 ‚äÜ c2, c0,(c0[sSet]<(Scalar ` ndx),(c6[|`s]c2)>)), (c0[|`v]c2), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3))
  syl2an(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, (c0[|`v]c2)= if(c5 ‚äÜ c2, c0,(c0[sSet]<(Scalar ` ndx),(c6[|`s]c2)>)), c0 ‚àà ùïå, c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  elex(c0, c1)
  elex(c2, c3)
  mpd3an3(c0 ‚àà ùïå, c2 ‚àà ùïå, (c0[|`v]c2)= if(c5 ‚äÜ c2, c0,(c0[sSet]<(Scalar ` ndx),(c6[|`s]c2)>)), if(c5 ‚äÜ c2, c0,(c0[sSet]<(Scalar ` ndx),(c6[|`s]c2)>))‚àà ùïå)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà ùïå, c2 ‚àà ùïå, if(c5 ‚äÜ c2, c0,(c0[sSet]<(Scalar ` ndx),(c6[|`s]c2)>))‚àà ùïå)
  mpan2(c0 ‚àà ùïå, if(c5 ‚äÜ c2, c0,(c0[sSet]<(Scalar ` ndx),(c6[|`s]c2)>))‚àà ùïå, (c0[sSet]<(Scalar ` ndx),(c6[|`s]c2)>)‚àà ùïå)
  ovex(c0, csts, <(Scalar ` ndx),(c6[|`s]c2)>)
  ifcl(c0, universe, (c0[sSet]<(Scalar ` ndx),(c6[|`s]c2)>), c5 ‚äÜ c2)
  ovmpt2ga(hs0, hs1, c0, universe, c2, universe, if(c5 ‚äÜ c2, c0,(c0[sSet]<(Scalar ` ndx),(c6[|`s]c2)>)), universe, cresv, if((Base `(Scalar ` hs0))‚äÜ hs1, hs0,(hs0[sSet]<(Scalar ` ndx),((Scalar ` hs0)[|`s]hs1)>)))
  ifbieq12d(hs0, (hs0[sSet]<(Scalar ` ndx),((Scalar ` hs0)[|`s]hs1)>), c0, (c0[sSet]<(Scalar ` ndx),(c6[|`s]c2)>), (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2), (Base `(Scalar ` hs0))‚äÜ hs1, c5 ‚äÜ c2)
  sseq12d((Base `(Scalar ` hs0)), hs1, c5, c2, (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2))
  syl6eqr((Base `(Scalar ` hs0)), c5, (Base ` c6), (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2))
  fveq2d(cbs, (Scalar ` hs0), c6, (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2))
  oveq12d(hs0, csts, <(Scalar ` ndx),((Scalar ` hs0)[|`s]hs1)>, c0, <(Scalar ` ndx),(c6[|`s]c2)>, (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2))
  opeq2d((Scalar ` ndx), ((Scalar ` hs0)[|`s]hs1), (c6[|`s]c2), (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2))
  oveq12d((Scalar ` hs0), cress, hs1, c6, c2, (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2))
  syl6eqr((Scalar ` hs0), c6, (Scalar ` c0), (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2))
  fveq2d(csca, hs0, c0, (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2))
  simpl(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2)
  simpr(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2)
  df-resv(hs0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(if(c5 ‚äÜ c2, c0,(c0[sSet]<(Scalar ` ndx),(c6[|`s]c2)>)))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(if(c5 ‚äÜ c2, c0,(c0[sSet]<(Scalar ` ndx),(c6[|`s]c2)>)))
}

blocks.name: resvid2
blocks.content: General behavior of trivial restriction. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 6-Sep-2018.)

blocks.name: resvval2
blocks.content: Value of nontrivial structure restriction. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 6-Sep-2018.)

blocks.name: resvsca
blocks.content: Base set of a structure restriction. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 6-Sep-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm resvsca(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(co(c2, cress, c0), cfv(csca, c3)))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c4, cresv, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(csca, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c2))
} = {
  pm2.61ian(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(co(c2, cress, c0), cfv(csca, c3)), wcel(c4, universe))
  pm2.61i(wi(wa(wcel(c4, universe), wcel(c0, c1)), wceq(co(c2, cress, c0), cfv(csca, c3))), wss(c5, c0))
  3expib(wss(c5, c0), wcel(c4, universe), wcel(c0, c1), wceq(co(c2, cress, c0), cfv(csca, c3)))
  3eqtr4a(co(c2, cress, c0), cfv(csca, c3), c2, cfv(csca, c4), w3a(wss(c5, c0), wcel(c4, universe), wcel(c0, c1)))
  3adant2(wss(c5, c0), wcel(c4, universe), wcel(c0, c1), wceq(co(c2, cress, c0), c2))
  mp3an2(wss(c5, c0), wcel(c0, c1), wceq(co(c2, cress, c0), c2), wcel(c2, universe))
  fvexi(c2, csca, c4)
  ressid2(c5, c0, c2, universe, c1, co(c2, cress, c0))
  eqid(co(c2, cress, c0))
  fveq2d(csca, c3, c4, w3a(wss(c5, c0), wcel(c4, universe), wcel(c0, c1)))
  resvid2(c5, c0, c4, universe, c1, c3, c2)
  3expib(wn(wss(c5, c0)), wcel(c4, universe), wcel(c0, c1), wceq(co(c2, cress, c0), cfv(csca, c3)))
  eqtr4d(co(c2, cress, c0), cfv(csca, c3), cfv(csca, co(c4, csts, cop(cfv(csca, cnx), co(c2, cress, c0)))), w3a(wn(wss(c5, c0)), wcel(c4, universe), wcel(c0, c1)))
  sylancl(w3a(wn(wss(c5, c0)), wcel(c4, universe), wcel(c0, c1)), wceq(co(c2, cress, c0), cfv(csca, co(c4, csts, cop(cfv(csca, cnx), co(c2, cress, c0))))), wcel(c4, universe), wcel(co(c2, cress, c0), universe))
  simp2(wn(wss(c5, c0)), wcel(c4, universe), wcel(c0, c1))
  ovex(c2, cress, c0)
  setsid(c4, universe, co(c2, cress, c0), universe, csca)
  fveq2d(csca, c3, co(c4, csts, cop(cfv(csca, cnx), co(c2, cress, c0))), w3a(wn(wss(c5, c0)), wcel(c4, universe), wcel(c0, c1)))
  resvval2(c5, c0, c4, universe, c1, c3, c2)
  adantr(wn(wcel(c4, universe)), wcel(c0, c1), wceq(co(c2, cress, c0), cfv(csca, c3)))
  3eqtr4a(co(c2, cress, c0), cfv(csca, c3), co(emptycls, cress, c0), cfv(csca, emptycls), wn(wcel(c4, universe)))
  3eqtr4ri(co(emptycls, cress, c0), cfv(csca, emptycls), cfv(emptycls, cfv(csca, cnx)), emptycls)
  0fv(cfv(csca, cnx))
  strfvn(csca, emptycls, cfv(csca, cnx))
  0ex()
  scaid()
  ress0(c0)
  oveq1d(c2, cress, c0, emptycls, wn(wcel(c4, universe)))
  syl5eq(c2, emptycls, cfv(csca, c4), wn(wcel(c4, universe)))
  fvprc(c4, csca)
  fveq2d(csca, c3, emptycls, wn(wcel(c4, universe)))
  syl5eq(c3, emptycls, co(c4, cresv, c0), wn(wcel(c4, universe)))
  ovprc1(c4, cresv, c0)
  reldmresv()
}
blocks.pretty:
thm resvsca(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c2[|`s]c0)=(Scalar ` c3))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(c4[|`v]c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Scalar ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(Base ` c2)
} = {
  pm2.61ian(c0 ‚àà c1, (c2[|`s]c0)=(Scalar ` c3), c4 ‚àà ùïå)
  pm2.61i(((c4 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c0 ‚àà c1)‚Üí(c2[|`s]c0)=(Scalar ` c3)), c5 ‚äÜ c0)
  3expib(c5 ‚äÜ c0, c4 ‚àà ùïå, c0 ‚àà c1, (c2[|`s]c0)=(Scalar ` c3))
  3eqtr4a((c2[|`s]c0), (Scalar ` c3), c2, (Scalar ` c4), (c5 ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß c4 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c0 ‚àà c1))
  3adant2(c5 ‚äÜ c0, c4 ‚àà ùïå, c0 ‚àà c1, (c2[|`s]c0)= c2)
  mp3an2(c5 ‚äÜ c0, c0 ‚àà c1, (c2[|`s]c0)= c2, c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvexi(c2, csca, c4)
  ressid2(c5, c0, c2, universe, c1, (c2[|`s]c0))
  eqid((c2[|`s]c0))
  fveq2d(csca, c3, c4, (c5 ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß c4 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c0 ‚àà c1))
  resvid2(c5, c0, c4, universe, c1, c3, c2)
  3expib(¬¨ c5 ‚äÜ c0, c4 ‚àà ùïå, c0 ‚àà c1, (c2[|`s]c0)=(Scalar ` c3))
  eqtr4d((c2[|`s]c0), (Scalar ` c3), (Scalar `(c4[sSet]<(Scalar ` ndx),(c2[|`s]c0)>)), (¬¨ c5 ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß c4 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c0 ‚àà c1))
  sylancl((¬¨ c5 ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß c4 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c0 ‚àà c1), (c2[|`s]c0)=(Scalar `(c4[sSet]<(Scalar ` ndx),(c2[|`s]c0)>)), c4 ‚àà ùïå, (c2[|`s]c0)‚àà ùïå)
  simp2(¬¨ c5 ‚äÜ c0, c4 ‚àà ùïå, c0 ‚àà c1)
  ovex(c2, cress, c0)
  setsid(c4, universe, (c2[|`s]c0), universe, csca)
  fveq2d(csca, c3, (c4[sSet]<(Scalar ` ndx),(c2[|`s]c0)>), (¬¨ c5 ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß c4 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c0 ‚àà c1))
  resvval2(c5, c0, c4, universe, c1, c3, c2)
  adantr(¬¨ c4 ‚àà ùïå, c0 ‚àà c1, (c2[|`s]c0)=(Scalar ` c3))
  3eqtr4a((c2[|`s]c0), (Scalar ` c3), (‚àÖ[|`s]c0), (Scalar ` ‚àÖ), ¬¨ c4 ‚àà ùïå)
  3eqtr4ri((‚àÖ[|`s]c0), (Scalar ` ‚àÖ), (‚àÖ `(Scalar ` ndx)), emptycls)
  0fv((Scalar ` ndx))
  strfvn(csca, emptycls, (Scalar ` ndx))
  0ex()
  scaid()
  ress0(c0)
  oveq1d(c2, cress, c0, emptycls, ¬¨ c4 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl5eq(c2, emptycls, (Scalar ` c4), ¬¨ c4 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvprc(c4, csca)
  fveq2d(csca, c3, emptycls, ¬¨ c4 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl5eq(c3, emptycls, (c4[|`v]c0), ¬¨ c4 ‚àà ùïå)
  ovprc1(c4, cresv, c0)
  reldmresv()
}

blocks.name: resvlem
blocks.content: Other elements of a structure restriction. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 6-Sep-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm resvlem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cfv(c3, c4)))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c5, cresv, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(c3, c5))
  -| wceq(c3, cslot(c6))
  -| wcel(c6, cn)
  -| wne(c6, nat5)
} = {
  syl6reqr(c2, cfv(c3, c4), cfv(c3, c5), wcel(c0, c1))
  pm2.61ian(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c3, c4), cfv(c3, c5)), wcel(c5, universe))
  pm2.61i(wi(wa(wcel(c5, universe), wcel(c0, c1)), wceq(cfv(c3, c4), cfv(c3, c5))), wss(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c5)), c0))
  3expib(wss(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c5)), c0), wcel(c5, universe), wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c3, c4), cfv(c3, c5)))
  fveq2d(c3, c4, c5, w3a(wss(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c5)), c0), wcel(c5, universe), wcel(c0, c1)))
  resvid2(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c5)), c0, c5, universe, c1, c4, cfv(csca, c5))
  3expib(wn(wss(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c5)), c0)), wcel(c5, universe), wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c3, c4), cfv(c3, c5)))
  syl6eqr(cfv(c3, c4), cfv(c3, c5), cfv(c3, co(c5, csts, cop(cfv(csca, cnx), co(cfv(csca, c5), cress, c0)))), w3a(wn(wss(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c5)), c0)), wcel(c5, universe), wcel(c0, c1)))
  fveq2d(c3, c4, co(c5, csts, cop(cfv(csca, cnx), co(cfv(csca, c5), cress, c0))), w3a(wn(wss(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c5)), c0)), wcel(c5, universe), wcel(c0, c1)))
  resvval2(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c5)), c0, c5, universe, c1, c4, cfv(csca, c5))
  eqid(cfv(csca, c5))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c5)))
  setsnid(c3, c5, cfv(csca, cnx), co(cfv(csca, c5), cress, c0))
  ndxid(c3, c6)
  neeqtrri(cfv(c3, cnx), cfv(csca, cnx), nat5)
  eqnetri(cfv(c3, cnx), nat5, c6)
  ndxarg(c3, c6)
  scandx()
  adantr(wn(wcel(c5, universe)), wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c3, c4), cfv(c3, c5)))
  eqtr4d(cfv(c3, c4), cfv(c3, c5), emptycls, wn(wcel(c5, universe)))
  syl6eqr(cfv(c3, c4), emptycls, cfv(c3, emptycls), wn(wcel(c5, universe)))
  fveq2d(c3, c4, emptycls, wn(wcel(c5, universe)))
  syl5eq(c4, emptycls, co(c5, cresv, c0), wn(wcel(c5, universe)))
  ovprc1(c5, cresv, c0)
  reldmresv()
  str0(c3, c6)
  fvprc(c5, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm resvlem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c2 =(c3 ` c4))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(c5[|`v]c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(c3 ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c3 = Slot(c6)
  ‚ä£ c6 ‚àà ‚Ñï

} = {

blocks.name: resv0g
blocks.content: ` 0g ` is unaffected by scalar restriction. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 6-Sep-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm resv0g(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cfv(c0g, c3)))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c4, cresv, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(c0g, c4))
} = {
  syl5eq(c2, cfv(c0g, c3), cfv(c0g, c4), wcel(c0, c1))
  grpidpropd(hs0, hs1, c4, c3, cfv(cbs, c4), wcel(c0, c1))
  eqidd(cfv(cbs, c4), wcel(c0, c1))
  resvbas(c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c4), c3, c4)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c4))
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, cfv(cplusg, c4), cfv(cplusg, c3), wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c4)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c4))))
  resvplusg(c0, c1, cfv(cplusg, c4), c3, c4)
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c4))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c4))
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, c4))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, c1))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(c0, c1))
}

  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c2 =(0 ` c3))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(c4[|`v]c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(0 ` c4)
} = {
  syl5eq(c2, (0 ` c3), (0 ` c4), c0 ‚àà c1)
  grpidpropd(hs0, hs1, c4, c3, (Base ` c4), c0 ‚àà c1)
  eqidd((Base ` c4), c0 ‚àà c1)
  resvbas(c0, c1, (Base ` c4), c3, c4)
  eqid((Base ` c4))
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, (+ ` c4), (+ ` c3), c0 ‚àà c1, (hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c4)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c4)))
  resvplusg(c0, c1, (+ ` c4), c3, c4)
  eqid((+ ` c4))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c((Base ` c4))
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c((Base ` c4))
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ‚àà c1)
  diff.hs1.w(c0 ‚àà c1)
}

blocks.name: resv1r
blocks.content: ` 1r ` is unaffected by scalar restriction. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 6-Sep-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm resv1r(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cfv(cur, c3)))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c4, cresv, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cur, c4))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(c2, cfv(cur, c3), cio(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c4)), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c4), wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c4), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cmulr, c4), cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)))))), cio(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c3)), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c3), wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c3), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cmulr, c3), cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)))))), wcel(c0, c1))
  iotabidv(hs0, wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c4)), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c4), wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c4), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cmulr, c4), cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c3)), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c3), wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c3), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cmulr, c3), cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))))))
  anbi12d(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c4)), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c4), wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c4), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cmulr, c4), cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c3)), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c3), wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c3), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cmulr, c3), cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)))))
  eleq2d(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c4), cfv(cbs, c3), wcel(c0, c1))
  raleqbidv(hs1, cfv(cbs, c4), cfv(cbs, c3), wcel(c0, c1), wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c4), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cmulr, c4), cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))), wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c3), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cmulr, c3), cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))))
  resvbas(c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c4), c3, c4)
  anbi12d(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c4), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cmulr, c4), cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c3), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cmulr, c3), cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c4), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c3), cv(hs1)), wcel(c0, c1))
  oveqd(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c4), cv(hs1), cfv(cmulr, c3), wcel(c0, c1))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cmulr, c4), cv(hs0)), cv(hs1), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cmulr, c3), cv(hs0)), wcel(c0, c1))
  oveqd(cv(hs1), cfv(cmulr, c4), cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c3), wcel(c0, c1))
  resvmulr(c0, c1, cfv(cmulr, c4), c3, c4)
  dfur2(hs0, hs1, c2, cfv(cbs, c4), cfv(cmulr, c4), c4)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c4))
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c4))
  dfur2(hs0, hs1, cfv(cur, c3), cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(cmulr, c3), c3)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c3))
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c3))
  eqid(cfv(cur, c3))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, c1))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c4))
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, c4))
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c3))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, c3))
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm resv1r(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c2 =(1r ` c3))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(c4[|`v]c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(1r ` c4)
} = {
  3eqtr4g(c2, (1r ` c3), iota(hs0,(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c4)‚àß ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c4),((hs0[(√ó ` c4)]hs1)= hs1 ‚àß(hs1[(√ó ` c4)]hs0)= hs1)))), iota(hs0,(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c3)‚àß ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c3),((hs0[(√ó ` c3)]hs1)= hs1 ‚àß(hs1[(√ó ` c3)]hs0)= hs1)))), c0 ‚àà c1)
  iotabidv(hs0, c0 ‚àà c1, (hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c4)‚àß ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c4),((hs0[(√ó ` c4)]hs1)= hs1 ‚àß(hs1[(√ó ` c4)]hs0)= hs1))), (hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c3)‚àß ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c3),((hs0[(√ó ` c3)]hs1)= hs1 ‚àß(hs1[(√ó ` c3)]hs0)= hs1))))
  anbi12d(c0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c4), ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c4),((hs0[(√ó ` c4)]hs1)= hs1 ‚àß(hs1[(√ó ` c4)]hs0)= hs1)), hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c3), ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c3),((hs0[(√ó ` c3)]hs1)= hs1 ‚àß(hs1[(√ó ` c3)]hs0)= hs1)))
  eleq2d(hs0, (Base ` c4), (Base ` c3), c0 ‚àà c1)
  raleqbidv(hs1, (Base ` c4), (Base ` c3), c0 ‚àà c1, ((hs0[(√ó ` c4)]hs1)= hs1 ‚àß(hs1[(√ó ` c4)]hs0)= hs1), ((hs0[(√ó ` c3)]hs1)= hs1 ‚àß(hs1[(√ó ` c3)]hs0)= hs1))
  resvbas(c0, c1, (Base ` c4), c3, c4)
  anbi12d(c0 ‚àà c1, (hs0[(√ó ` c4)]hs1)= hs1, (hs1[(√ó ` c4)]hs0)= hs1, (hs0[(√ó ` c3)]hs1)= hs1, (hs1[(√ó ` c3)]hs0)= hs1)
  eqeq1d((hs0[(√ó ` c4)]hs1), hs1, (hs0[(√ó ` c3)]hs1), c0 ‚àà c1)
  oveqd(hs0, (√ó ` c4), hs1, (√ó ` c3), c0 ‚àà c1)
  eqeq1d((hs1[(√ó ` c4)]hs0), hs1, (hs1[(√ó ` c3)]hs0), c0 ‚àà c1)
  oveqd(hs1, (√ó ` c4), hs0, (√ó ` c3), c0 ‚àà c1)
  resvmulr(c0, c1, (√ó ` c4), c3, c4)
  dfur2(hs0, hs1, c2, (Base ` c4), (√ó ` c4), c4)
  eqid((Base ` c4))
  eqid((√ó ` c4))
  dfur2(hs0, hs1, (1r ` c3), (Base ` c3), (√ó ` c3), c3)
  eqid((Base ` c3))
  eqid((√ó ` c3))
  eqid((1r ` c3))
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ‚àà c1)
  diff.hs1.w(c0 ‚àà c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c((Base ` c4))
  diff.hs0.c(c4)

blocks.name: resvcmn
blocks.content: Scalar restriction preserves commutative monoids. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 6-Sep-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm resvcmn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c2, ccmn), wcel(c3, ccmn)))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c2, cresv, c0))
} = {
  cmnpropd(hs0, hs1, c2, c3, cfv(cbs, c2), wcel(c0, c1))
  eqidd(cfv(cbs, c2), wcel(c0, c1))
  resvbas(c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c2), c3, c2)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c2))
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, cfv(cplusg, c2), cfv(cplusg, c3), wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c2))))
  resvplusg(c0, c1, cfv(cplusg, c2), c3, c2)
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c2))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c2))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, c2))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, c1))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(c0, c1))
}

thm resvcmn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c2 ‚àà CMnd ‚Üî c3 ‚àà CMnd))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(c2[|`v]c0)
} = {
  cmnpropd(hs0, hs1, c2, c3, (Base ` c2), c0 ‚àà c1)
  eqidd((Base ` c2), c0 ‚àà c1)

  eqid((Base ` c2))
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, (+ ` c2), (+ ` c3), c0 ‚àà c1, (hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c2)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c2)))
  resvplusg(c0, c1, (+ ` c2), c3, c2)
  eqid((+ ` c2))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

  diff.hs0.c(c3)
